sentences.en: Hang the picture somewhere where it will show up to advantage.
sentences.cn: 把这幅画挂在便于它显示较好效果的地方.

sentences.en: His height gives him an inbuilt advantage over his opponent.
sentences.cn: 他的身高成为他相对于对手的先天优势。

sentences.en: His height was a decided advantage in the job.
sentences.cn: 干这项工作，他的身高是明显优势。

sentences.en: If you're too trusting, other people will take advantage of you.
sentences.cn: 如果你过于轻信，其他人就会打你的主意。

sentences.en: It might be to your advantage (=  it might help you  ) to take a computer course of some kind.
sentences.cn: 上一门计算机课程可能对你有利。

sentences.en: Mestel holds a slight advantage.
sentences.cn: 梅斯特尔占有微弱优势。

sentences.en: My skill in such matters might redound to my advantage.
sentences.cn: 我在这种事情上的技能可能会对我有所帮助。

sentences.en: One of the many advantages of living in New York is that you can eat out at almost any time of day.
sentences.cn: 住在纽约的诸多好处之一是几乎任何时候都可以外出吃饭。

sentences.en: She took advantage of him even after they were divorced.
sentences.cn: 甚至在他们离婚后，她还在占他的便宜。

sentences.en: take advantage of all educational opportunities.
sentences.cn: 利用一切教育机会

sentences.en: Take advantage of low-season airfares.
sentences.cn: 利用淡季飞机票价。

sentences.en: The advantage in going faster is that you get there quicker.
sentences.cn: 快点走的好处在于，你可以早点到达那里。

sentences.en: The advantage is lost.
sentences.cn: 错失优势。

sentences.en: The roses were displayed to advantage in a blue vase.
sentences.cn: 玫瑰插在蓝色的花瓶中，产生了良好的效果

sentences.en: They are taking undue advantage of the situation.
sentences.cn: 他们过分利用了这种情势。

sentences.en: They threw away their advantage by their savagery to the black population.
sentences.cn: 他们因为野蛮对待黑人居民而丧失了自己的有利地位.

sentences.en: This gave them a decided advantage over their opponents.
sentences.cn: 这使他们比对手具有明显的优势.

sentences.en: This printer has several advantages over conventional printers.
sentences.cn: 与传统打印机相比，这种打印机具有多项优点。

sentences.en: to have a tactical advantage
sentences.cn: 拥有战术上的优势

sentences.en: took advantage of the customer.
sentences.cn: 欺骗消费者

sentences.en: You may wish to take advantage of our instructional session.
sentences.cn: 你应该充分利用我们的教学课程。

sentences.en: Younger workers tend to be at an advantage (=  have an advantage  ) when applying for jobs.
sentences.cn: 年轻点的工人申请工作时往往处于优势地位。

words.tran_cn: 得天独厚的；有利的；占有利位置的

phrases.tran_cn: 占优势；优于…的有利条件
占…的便宜：自私地获利；剥削
有利：产生良好效果；有利于

trans.tran_cn: 有利条件，优势，优点，好处
trans.tran_en: something that helps you to be more successful than others, or the state of having this

trans.tran_cn: 有利于，有助于，使处于有利地位
